Worked as an intern to drive the 4G sales to corporate customers. It included lead generation, public relations and holistically understand the LTE both in terms of business and engineering.

I have worked on content marketing, marketing and as well as for public relations for the respective newly developed mobile app.

Troubleshooting technical issues using CRM software for the HP printer customers in the US and Canada. The skills required was product knowledge, customer handling and cross selling and up selling products.
